comments:
Version: 3.1.0
Build id: 200412210800

When you try to export a feature that has an empty <URL/> node, the operation
fails and a dialog pops up telling you "Unable to find feature: <feature name>"
which isn't very helpful.

This is not detected as an error while editing the feature.xml and can easily be
reproduced by adding either an update or discovery url then removing it though
the form based editor.  The status object returned from the parser never reaces
wither the user or the log.

When removing the last update or discovery URL, the URL element should be deleted.


The following entry appears in the workbench log:

org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException: Error Parsing feature stream.
	at
org.eclipse.update.core.model.FeatureModelFactory.parseFeature(FeatureModelFactory.java:71)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.site.BuildTimeFeatureFactory.createFeature(BuildTimeFeatureFactory.java:45)
	at org.eclipse.update.core.Site.createFeature(Site.java:514)
	at
org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureReference.createFeature(FeatureReference.java:116)
	at org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureReference.getFeature(FeatureReference.java:104)
	at org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureReference.getFeature(FeatureReference.java:91)
	at
org.eclipse.update.core.FeatureReference.getVersionedIdentifier(FeatureReference.java:189)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.site.BuildTimeSite.findFeature(BuildTimeSite.java:112)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.builder.FeatureBuildScriptGenerator.initializeVariables(FeatureBuildScriptGenerator.java:755)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.builder.FeatureBuildScriptGenerator.generate(FeatureBuildScriptGenerator.java:175)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.BuildScriptGenerator.generateFeatures(BuildScriptGenerator.java:126)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.build.BuildScriptGenerator.generate(BuildScriptGenerator.java:62)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.exports.FeatureExportJob.makeScript(FeatureExportJob.java:252)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.exports.FeatureExportJob.doExport(FeatureExportJob.java:189)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.exports.FeatureExportJob.doExports(FeatureExportJob.java:143)
	at
org.eclipse.pde.internal.ui.wizards.exports.FeatureExportJob.run(FeatureExportJob.java:95)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:66)

The feature editor does not generate incorrect xml.
As per the feature.dtd, the url element can be childless.
<!ELEMENT url (update?, discovery*)>

Moving to Update as their parser should be resilient in this case.

cc Pascal as error reporting from PDE/Build could be improved.
